about_the_game:
The advanced Chinese civilization deploys its machines of war! Play as the exceptional Chinese - a technologically outstanding civilization that focuses on crossbowmen and siege engineers.

Three different types of crossbowmen, including repeating crossbows, provide overwhelming firepower in every situation. Snipers can take down high profile targets from far away, grenadiers are deadly against groups of enemies and flamethrowers will incinerate even the largest of armies.
Overseers make villagers work faster. Shaolin Monks can heal allied units, dodge incoming attacks and fight. Engineers can lay down mine fields and transform into siege weapons.

• Play as the Chinese in every Singleplayer and Multiplayer mode.
• Unique Overseer, Engineer and Siege mechanics.
• 6 unique Challenges.
• 22 buildings, 28 units.
• 2 heroes: Zhuge Liang and Yue Fei.
